name: Points Kingdom
description:
This game was  created for SoloCodeJam 5 in 15 days, and isn't exactly finished yet. It's also my first game and it was made with Godot Engine. You are just a point who lives his life of point, and collects other points to take part in its kingdom. Once it's done, prepare to FIGHT other kingdoms  via very unrealistic besieges.

Controls : This game is only playing with the mouse. To besiege the cities (which are just other points, the graphist was sick), click and drag following the lines.

I find my game very easy, I will nerf the score system soon. The second part of the game is impossible in hardcore mode though, but you'll easily reach 1kk points even with that.
